input: Which of the following freedoms is not specifically mentioned in the Constitution of India as a Fundamental Right but has been subsequently upheld by the Supreme Court as such?

options.A: Freedom of trade, occupation and business
options.B: Freedom to reside and settle in any part of the country

explanation: The constitution of India does not specifically mention the freedom of press. Freedom of press is implied from the Article 19(a) (a) of the Constitution.
